"Such thoughts are unbecoming of such a promising aspirant," said a voice from nowhere.

"What?" you said, embarrassed that this voice knew what you were thinking, and also worried about what it meant for your sanity.

"I am your assigned Spiritual Mentor for the power you have," the voice said. "I will teach you to be great, as great as Circe, as Calypso, as Medea of Colchis, as Morgana le Fey. I will teach you what it means to wield this power. I will teach you all that you wish to know, Aspirant."

"What? What are you talking about?"

"Your power is great, Aspirant. With the right training, such as I will provide you, you can live up to it, and none will stand in your way. My name is Hierophant, and upon this name I swear to guide you to the greatness that you so doubtless deserve." (A/N: All of the Spiritual Mentors have names taken from the Major Arcana of the Tarot deck.)

"What," you repeat, "are you going to teach me!?"

I had thought you were a little old to be assigned a Spiritual Mentor. Tell me, Ma Dame,” (A/N: pronounced madam, but with a French accent) “tell me of the events preceding the acquisition of your prodigious skill.”

You tell it everything – your trip to Salem, your purchase of the box as a souvenir, the fact that you were a twenty-year-old guy before you drank the potion, everything.

“I see,” Hierophant said. “This requires immediate action.” Suddenly, all the background noise stopped. ”I’ve stopped time,” Hierophant said smugly. ”Now, we can discuss possible courses of action in solitude regarding how not to divulge the secret of witchcraft.”

12521122.content:
Once you got outside, you systematically scoured the neighborhood to find out what changed. Your name, you found out, is "Danielle," not "Daniel," though you apparently still liked being called "Dan." You're a girly girl, but you apparently also had a bit of a tomboyish side from the way the boys at the miniature soccer field knew you by sight. You were in very good physical shape for your build, age, and gender, and for some reason, you found yourself craving a lollipop. Was that your new favorite snack?

You had a small but close-knit circle of friends. There was Harvey, who you knew from pre-transformation (he looked up to you), Lisa, who you didn’t but was apparently a friend of Harvey’s, and Josh, who was an indoorsy, bookish kind of boy. He kept blushing while looking at you… wait, he couldn’t have a crush, could he?

You spent pretty much the entire day playing with your friends. They were interesting to say the least. Josh was the common sense of the group; god knows you needed it. Harvey was a manly man in the making – hot-blooded, refused to back down from any challenge, the works. Lisa tried to keep Harvey on a leash most of the time, but in certain circumstances (such as when the person that Harvey was bothering insulted her on her appearance) she could be just as hot-blooded and start to cheer Harvey on.

Then came dusk, and you parted ways. Emma was pissed that you apparently managed to give her the slip, even though you hadn’t gone out of the neighborhood. Apparently, she worried about you. She made you dinner, and sent you off to bed.

In bed, you spoke Hierophant’s name.

“Yes, little one?” Hierophant asked.

“Is there any way you could teach me in my dreams or something?” you asked bluntly.

“Sleep learning is a dangerous process,” Hierophant said warningly. “It would require me to separate your soul from your body, which when handled improperly – “

“But you can handle it, can’t you?”

“My skills in such an area are, while not lacking, perhaps not as developed as they must be for safe practice. You, aspirant, are the most promising witch I have seen since Joan of Arc herself. I am only the sixth of twenty-two possible teachers you could have been assigned, and while I am the most skilled teacher among them, I am also, doubtless, the one with the least practical knowledge to impart… even so, I can cause you to have dreams I suppose, which should do for now. I must ask that you start a dream diary, aspirant.”

You grimaced. You had never liked writing.

“As they say nowadays, aspirant… ‘bite the bullet.’”


Your dreams that night were of an old man telling you things. He was old, very old, but proud and straight-backed. He was dressed in the white robes of a Catholic priest. His kindly smile made you feel safe and protected.

Then you woke up.

“Good morning to you, little one,” Hierophant greeted you. “Need I remind you to start the dream diary?”

You groaned and wrote your dream down on a pad of paper.

Dammit. You bit the bullet and started writing. You were just going to write down what Hierophant told you as you remembered it, but your mentor put a damper on those plans quickly. “As the diary is a physical object, little one,” he said, once again rankling you with the diminutive pet name, “it may be found by… undesirables. Your elder sister, for one. If you are to keep a dream diary, it must seem to be a dream diary, not a set of notes. A dream diary must always contain the entire dream, as you remember it. Furthermore, this exercise will improve your memory.”

Good points, but it still sucked ass. “Language.”

One of the things you learned from the dream was the structure of the spiritual guidance system. You were to learn from Hierophant for a time span of four years, or until Hierophant himself deemed you worthy of further education by another. At which point, you would be tutored by another guide, chosen based on your aptitudes and personality, possibly receiving Hierophant again, though the wizened-sounding spirit guessed based on your personality that it might be either Fortune or Strength, or possibly – “Arcana forbid” – Death. Then the cycle would repeat.

Also, witches were supposed to have greater-than-normal aptitude for science in general, as well as math, to a lesser extent. This was because the ability to use magic was tied in directly to an instinctual understanding of how the world works on both a physical and metaphysical level. They were also supposed to be slightly stronger and faster than most kids their age and build, though not enough to be noticeable. At that, you had pointed out that you had noticed, which Hierophant found to be interesting.

Magic, at its basic level, was simply a left-of-center method of manipulation of energy. Science could theorize all it wanted, but a universe without magic was simply unexplainable, or so Hierophant told you. He then explained about “cause and effect” and “no clear origin of the initial application of energy,” but you zoned. Hierophant’s lectures were by and large interesting and concise, and he was a very serious teacher for all his flattery, but damn, the… person… could use some heavy language.

Magic responded to willpower, but not to conscious effort, or so Hierophant told you, so that meant that it was tied into your emotions, presumably. At getting to this part of the dream, you asked Hierophant to clarify, and he said that magic was not emotional either, but based upon learning and mental discipline, in the same way that the body’s ability to defend itself was based upon reflex and physical discipline.

And that about summed up the dream.

"Not at all. But take a look at Stacey. See how thin she looks? It was the beans. If they can make her lose weight, they can make you lose weight. Try taking a red one like she did. It might make your normal again."

Emma glances at your thinned girlfriend, eying her more slender figure. Without a word she reaches into the jellybean jar and takes out two of them, devouring them. Stacey squeezes your hand, nervously. You, in contrast, are excited. You don't dislike Emma, but the prospect of seeing what else these magical fruits can do is too much.

Seconds pass before...
13211.title: Emma's Second Go

13213.content: As you head back down to the kitchen you trip on the chair, shaking the table. As you lie gasping on the floor you feel three of some thing going down your throat. You get up and think "I really hope those weren't the beans!" Sure enough something is happening. You feel like you are getting really full all of a sudden...
13213.title: Try one - everyone's doing it

1322.content:
Standing in the center of the room was a teenage boy. The short hairstyle and wiry body shape were clear – although the fact that he was wearing the same tee shirt and shorts set that Emma had been wearing minutes before suggested something was definitely not normal. After all, few teenage boys would voluntarily wear a purple Tinkerbell tee with matching shorts, which were so short that they left little to the imagination when worn by a boy.

“Emma?” you start…

“What the bloody hell is going on??!!” was the reply. You could see the look of terror in his / her eyes whilst trying to comprehend what had happened.

“OK, don't panic - sit down and I’ll try to explain…”

You repeat the story as you had previously explained it to Stacey, and Emma managed to remember that she had eaten a blue bean.

“So am I stuck like this?” the boy who is Emma asks.

“Well, we don’t think so. However, we’re not sure if we can actually reverse the effects. “

“You mean you haven’t got a clue…”

“Well yes.” You are forced to admit. “We’ve got a jar of beans, and we don’t know what they can do, and until then I guess you could say you’re stuck as you are.”

“In that case could I borrow some of your clothes? These shorts are killing me!”

You all relocate back to your bedroom, and you pull out a shirt, pair of boxers and shorts from your wardrobe and give them to Emma, who disappears for a minute to get changed.

On her return it was difficult to appreciate that she had ever been anything but a boy. She was now wearing your clothes, and had splashed a little water over her face, and spiked up her short hair slightly.

“Wow,” Stacey exclaimed. “You know you’re not bad looking as a boy!”

“Yeah, right. Well don't get any ideas - it's still me inside! God, Dan, how to you manage to walk properly with this stuff in the way?” Emma asks you, indicating her groin. Well that brought the conversation back down a level.

“Practice. You get used to it.” You focus your attention back on the jar. “OK, I think we need to do a better examination of these things, and try to log what we know.” You open a drawer and pull out a sheet of paper and pen, and start writing. Down the left hand side you start listing the colors of the beans, and then start writing the apparent results of each – well the two that had been used so far.

RED – Weight loss
BLUE - gender change / turns girl to boy

“Well, it’s a short list so far. Anything else we can determine without trying any more?”

You cannot see anything which could help clarify anything, and realize that you are really not much further forwards. You can sit it out to see if the effects are temporary and will wear off in time, or try out other beans to see what they will do.

You all agree that you cannot just sit and wait, so the only alternative would be to try out other colours, in the hope that you will indentify the antidote to Emma’s current predicament. The only real issue is who eats the next bean, and which color.
1322.title: your new brother

choices: Her age halves - she's now an 8 year old boy
13221.content:
"OK, what shall we do now?" you ask, as an open question to the others. "You have both eaten one of the beans, so guess to be fair I'd better try the next one."

"Not on your life!" Emma replies. "I have no particular desire to stay like this any longer than I must. I'll try another one."

"You realize that it may not turn you back - we've got several colors to get through yet ..."

"I'll take my chances then." Emma picks up another bean. "Purple." She pops it into her mouth.

Both Stacey and you watch Emma avidly, waiting to see what will happen.

"You sure you swallowed it? I can't see anything happening yet..." you ask. Then you realize you spoke five seconds too soon, as Emma seemed to start changing.

"Oh God! What now?" she says.

What is happening to her?
13221.title: Emma eats another bean

132211.content:
You notice the changes to Emma as the teenage boy's body she now has starts getting shorter in height, but also in overall size. Within a few seconds she has dropped from around 5' 8" to little over 4 feet tall, but you can see that her features have regressed in age. Inevitably the clothes that you had offered her to wear a few minutes before were now hanging loose around her. As she starts speaking you can tell than she is now a young boy..

"Oh shit! That's all I need. Not only have you made me a bloody boy, I'm now prepubescent!"

"Yeah, well, I'm sorry Emma." you respond. "although I didn't make you take the first one - you did that all on your own."

"Yeah, and my clothes are now falling off me."

You look more closely and indeed the pair of shorts you had given her have fallen to the floor, and the boxers are probably not far behind.

"I'll make a note of this change on the log... might be worth remembering this one. I can imagine it could be fun being a Cub Scout all over again." Both Emma and Stacey give you a quizzical look. "Oh come on, could be fun to run riot without any responsibilities!"

"OK, forget it! Jeez. Shall I have the next one then?"

The other two accept this as being at least a step forwards, even if they don't necessarily think it's a particularly brilliant idea.

So you venture forward, pick up a bean, and pop it into your mouth.

Nothing happened for a few seconds, then you feel hot all over, and are aware of something changing...
132211.title: An 8 year old Emma

1322112.content:
After a minute you feel normal again, but cannot detect any changes. However, the expressions of the faces of your sister and girlfriend suggest something has happened.

"Danny!!!" Stacey cries out. Oh blimey, what's happened then? You look down and everything seems normal, so why is Stacey looking so concerned.

"You'd better tell me what's changed, 'cos I can't see anything different." you say.

"Oh thank God you're still there."

"What do you mean? Of course I'm still here. Why would I go anywhere." Hang on a minute - why would she have possibly thought that you weren't here any more? You ask: "Um, what can you see?"
1322112.title: You turn invisible

13221122.content:
"Well, you've disappeared, but your clothes are still there. so we weren't really sure what was going on." Stacey says.

You look down, and you can see your hands as clearly as before. "Don't be silly. I can see myself."

"Well, we can't! Go have a look in the mirror!"

You walked across the room to face the full length mirror, totally skeptical of what you are being told. As you gaze at the reflection you realize the oddity of the situation. The reflection is only of your clothes - everywhere that you do not have a covering of clothing is totally invisible. However if you look down you can see yourself.

"Wow, that's really weird!" you pull off your shirt and drop it beside you, and in the mirror all you can see is you pants, apparently standing up unaided. A sudden realization comes to you."Got it!"

"What!" Stacey and Emma respond almost in unison.

"The beans. I think I know what they are." you reply.

"What, other than stating the obvious - that they're a bloody nuisance..." Emma says.

"Yep. They are a very clever and totally effective disguise. Ideal for a witch in a tricky situation to escape - just change how you look. Either there's one which will reverse the changes, or more likely the effects will wear off after a while."

"Well, guess that makes some sense." Emma responds. "So how long am I stuck as a little boy? I can't really go shopping like this - well not looking for make up anyway!"

So, what will you do next?
13221122.title: Only your clothes remain

132211221.content:
"Well," you announce. "Whilst it may be useful at times to be invisible, I can't really see any benefit at the moment. I'm going to try another one."

"Yeah, but each new bean just adds to the affect of the previous one, so you'll stay invisible." Stacey points out, "So how will we know what it does?"

"Well, I can see myself," you reply, "So I'll be able to see the changes, so I can work my way through several different colors without annoying anyone - cos nobody but me can see!"

The three of you debate the merits of this idea, and finally agree that it's as good a way of finding out what the beans effects are, and as you're already invisible it would only be once the effects wear off that you may suffer any humiliation in front of your sister and girlfriend.

"OK, Emma, could you grab the pencil and jot down the results as I tell them to you?

You open the lid of the jar, pour out a selection of the beans, then sort them so that you have only one of each color in front of you, return the duplicates back in the jar.

"So what color you trying first then?" Emma asks.

You pick up a yellow bean and pop it into your mouth, chew it briefly and swallow it down...

After a few seconds you can feel something happening, and glance at the mirror, but of course there is still no reflection. So you look down at your body, and realize that ...
132211221.title: Another bean

1322112212.content:
As you swallow the bean, your vision expands around your head, so you can see everything in the room around you. In the mirror to your left, you see the back of your head, you see the table with the beans on it to your right. Stacey and Emma were sitting in front of you and you could see the door behind you.
"This is so weird," you say "I can see everything."
"Could you be more specific?" asked Emma, her pen poised over the paper.
"My vision, It's expanded to 360 degrees, I can see everything around me at the same time without turning my head."
"I can certainly see the advantages of that," said Emma "A little strange that one, but I suppose going with your disguise theory, it would allow the witch to see what's behind her without her pursuer getting suspicious."
"Well, i'm going to try another," you say, picking out a green bean and popping it into your mouth.
1322112212.title: You have 360 degree vision

choices: Turn around and tell Stacey and Emma the effect of the bean
Turn around (Emma and Stacey see the boobs stretching out your t-shirt and guess
13221122121.content: You feel a strange sensation over your whole body, as if goosebumps were travelling up from the tip of your toes to the top of your head. As they moved up your legs, you felt the hair in your legs retracting and the legs themselves becoming slightly longer and more toned. You didn't really know what was happening until the change reached your crotch. Up until that point, you had thought you were losing weight, like Stacy had, but the strange sensations in your crotch as your penis shrank into your body put an end to that theory. You turned towards the mirror so you were facing it. Your bottom half had now feminised, your butt was bigger, your legs longer and your penis, gone. And the change wasn't finished yet, the goosebumps moving up to your chest. Your t-shirt stretched as very large boobs grew on your body, stretching your t-shirt slightly, you guessed about E cup but you weren't a boob expert so could have been wrong. Finally the goosebumps moved to your head, reshaping your face and then growing out your hair. Staring at you in the mirror, was a female version of yourself. And you were hot. So hot that had you been male, and single, you would have no problem lusting over her.
13221122121.title: You change into a girl

132211221212.content:
"Danny, we can see some of your hair now," said Stacy "What happened?"
You turn around, revealing your stretched t-shirt.
"Oh my god," said Stacy
"Yeah," you say, then gasp, hearing a feminine voice coming from your mouth."
"I guess we've found out which one will change me back then," said Emma, taking green bean and heading back to her room to get changed.
"This feels so weird," you say "I can't even examine myself properly because of the 360 vision." You put up your invisible hand to your breast, feeling them experimentally.
"Eh hem," said Stacy. It was only then you realized that your sleeve had come up and the depressions in your t shirt showed Stacy exactly what you had been doing.
"Sorry," you say "I still have to take more beans though, we've found out how to change Emma back, but we haven't gotten one to turn me visible again yet."
"Your right," said Stacy "Here, take another bean."
132211221212.title: Turn around (Emma and Stacey see the boobs stre...

1322112212122.content:
You ate the white bean, hoping you would become visible again. Nothing happened, or at least, nothing you could see.
"Have you guys got any idea what happened?" you asked, still in the feminine voice that you still hadn't got used to.
"I can see you again, Danny," said Stacy "That bean turned you visible again."
"Cool," you say, just as Emma re-entered the room, now female again and wearing female clothes, but still 8 yrs old.
"Well," said Emma "It's a lovely day and I don't want to sit around here all day, why don't we go to the beach."
"All right then," said Stacy "Could I borrow one of your bikinis, i'm about your size now?
"Sure," said Emma "I already found a swimsuit from when I was eight, if you want to come, Danny, you'll have to borrow one of my swimsuits as well."

Do you decide to go to the beach with Emma and Stacy, or stay home and eat more beans?
1322112212122.title: A white bean

13221122121221.content: Will you go as a boy or as a girl?
13221122121221.title: Go to the beach

132211221212211.content:
"All right," you say "I'll come with you, show me your swimsuits."
Emma led you and Stacy into her bedroom where two swimsuits and one set of clothes were set out. You look at Emma quizically.
"You can't go to the beach in guy clothes if your going as a girl," said Emma shrugging "If you'd prefer, you can go and change back, and go as a guy to the beach."
You consider for a moment, then shake your head. "I'll put these clothes on, but you might have to help me with a few things," you say "As you can probably guess, I've never put a bra on before."
Emma and Stacy laugh, then help you get dressed. None of you need make up as you're going to the beach. You put the bikini on under your clothes, putting the bra and panties in a swimming bag along with a towel and goggles. Then, as Stacy was the only one who could pass for her original self, she drives you and Emma to the beach.
132211221212211.title: Stay a girl

choices: Stacey asks you to turn over onto your back so she can do your sunscreen
Stacey asks you to do her sunscreen
1322112212122111.content: It was still quite early in the morning, so you managed to find three beds next to each other quite easily. Putting the towels on the bed, you, Stacey and Emma made for the sea to have some fun. It was fun, splashing each other and laughing, although Emma was carried off by the waves a couple times, and you had to retrieve her. About an hour later, you and the two other girls returned to the beds to dry off and rest.
1322112212122111.title: The beach

1322112212122112.content:
Before you leave, you look down at the list of beans and effects:

RED: Weight Loss
BLUE: Gender Change/ turns girl into boy
PURPLE: Reduces age by 50%
BLACK: Turns you invisible
YELLOW: Expands vision to 360 degrees
GREEN: Gender Change/ turns boy into girl
WHITE: Turns you visible

Then you follow Stacy and Emma out to Stacy's car.
1322112212122112.title: In the car

13221122121221121.content:
The bikini you are wearing is extremely uncomfortable, but aside from that, being a girl isn't so bad. You get free drinks at the beach bar, the water feels nice as it laps against your breasts, as you swim, a little harder in a bikini, but not by much. In all, it isn't a bad day as a girl. It's not something you'd like to become permanent, but it's fun for a day.

In the evening, the three of you return home, Emma still in the form of a little girl, you still in the form of a girl.

"That wasn't too bad," you say, unlocking the door and leading Emma and Stacy into the house.
"It wasn't," said Stacy "Although we still need to find out how to change Emma back. She might be a girl again, but she's still 8."
"I did have a theory about that," you say, pulling out a bean the colour of the night sky, a much darker purple than the one Emma had taken to reduce her age.

"Here," you say to Emma,offering her the bean, which she eats. She immediately starts to grow, growing out of her clothes, her training bra snapping as she grows past puberty, her other clothes looking very tight, but so far remaining intact, although her attire wouldn't look out of place on a prostitute now.

This situation doesn't last long, though, as she cries out in pain as her top rips, falling to the ground along with her broken training bra. Her bikini bottom, supposedly for an 8 year old, and now stretched beyond it's limit, joins the rest of her clothes in tatters on the floor. You leave the room at this point to get a towel for her to cover herself, as while you're still female, you don't want to be perving at your naked sister. You re-enter the room, and, not looking, hold out the towel, as Emma takes it and wraps it around herself, covering her bare skin. She muttered thanks as she hurries out of the room and back into hers, closing the door behind her.
13221122121221121.title: At the beach

choices: Push Stacy away, and go for the beans
132211221212211211.content: As you made your way towards the packet, stripping down so you don't tear Stacy's clothes, to eat a blue bean so you can turn back, Stacy jumps you from behind, pulling you backwards onto the bed, and climbing round to straddle you. Your vision from the back of your head is blocked by your head, as Stacy kisses you, one hand kneading your breast as the other pushes your hand to do the same.
132211221212211211.title: Stacy jumps you

1322112212122112112.content:
You push Stacy off you.
"Stacy stop, this feels wrong," you say "I need to change back. What the hell was that about?"
"I'm sorry," said Stacy "I'm bi, and you looked so good when you stripped off. I had to take advantage of that opporrtunity."
"I'm in no way ready for that," you say "I've been a girl for less than a day. Look, I won't say no indefinitely, but for now, I'm not ready for that as a girl."
You walked over to the beans, and downed a blue bean.
1322112212122112112.title: Push Stacy away, and go for the beans

13221122121221121122.content:
Unfortunate the light was not perfect and you grabbed a turquoise bean. Turquoise is very close and similar to blue, but actually not really the same.
You realize the mistake you made, but too late, the changes already starting….
13221122121221121122.title: Was that blue? Uh oh.

132211221212211211222.content: You see lines appear on every joint of your body. And when Emma grabs your arm, it pops off.
132211221212211211222.title: something else

132211221212211212.content: Does Stacy really eat a bean?
132211221212211212.title: Stacy eats a bean

choices: A color no one has tried yet(she’s feeling daring)
1322112212122112121.content: What color bean does Stacy eat?
1322112212122112121.title: Stacy eats a bean

13221122121221122.content:
Emma said that Stacy is the only one who had not taken a bean so far
So she agrees with Danny, that now Stacy should take a bean

which color?
13221122121221122.title: On the way

132211222.content:
"Well, it's a brilliant sunny day, and I don't want to sit around here waiting for something to happen that could take ages. Besides, I've got the slimmest figure I've had since I turned 13, so I want to enjoy it. Anyone fancy heading to the beach?"

Both Emma and you look at her, and consider the situation.

"Danny - have you got any of your old clothes anywhere - like a pair of shorts or swimming trunks?" Emma asks.

"Um, yeah. Try the back shelf of the closet." The 8 year old boy who is actually your sister disappears into the closet.

So looks like its a beach day then. However, you can't go like you are - it would certainly attract some funny looks seeing a pair of pants walking along. Easily solved. You strip off completely. Now this is really odd. You can see yourself quite clearly, but if you look in the mirror you see nothing.

Emma returns wearing an old pair of your swimming trunks and a small tee shirt, looking just like any other 8 year old boy about to head to the beach.

"Well, guess you're both ready then. Emma - could I borrow a bikini please? I think I must be about your size now - well, your usual size..." Stacey asks.

"Yeah, sure. Guess I won't be needing one this afternoon now." Emma disappears to her own room and returns clutching a bikini, and hands it to Stacey.

"OK - we all set then?" Stacey asks, looking around to try to locate you.

"Yep" you reply, making her jump a little.

"Grief, I think you'd better hold my hand so I know where you are. "she says.

You grab a couple of towels, and then realize that you can't carry anything - a pair of towels floating in mid air may attract some attention. "Guess you'd better take these then." you say as you pass them to Stacey.
,
132211222.title: To the beach?

choices: You decide to go for a swim
1322112221.content:
The trip to the beach is fairly uneventful. Stacey holds tight to your hand all the way, whilst Emma is very self conscious about her new body. On route you all decide that you can't keep referring to Emma by her real name, as this may cause a few raised eyebrows if anyone overhears, so you agree to call her Matt instead. Meanwhile in your invisible state Stacey tells you that you will need to be discrete (which you consider to be relatively easy as nobody can see you!) - but then points out that you can't be too noisy, and certainly cannot bump into anyone.

The beach is set alongside a bend in the river estuary, a couple of miles upstream from the coast itself, but with fine sand leading down to the water, which is a popular spot for sunbathing and swimming. You all stop on the grassy ridge overlooking the sand, and chose your spot. Despite being warm and fairly sunny, the beach is relatively quiet, so you make you way down onto the sand, Stacey lays out the towels, and you all sit down.

Stacey immediately lays out to make the most of the sunshine, wearing Emma's bikini which seems to fit to perfection. You cannot help admire her slender figure, and secretly hope that the effect of her jellybean does not wear off, as you would be very happy for her to stay just like she is. Meanwhile Emma just sits still, not really sure what to do.

"Why don't you at least take off your tee shirt?" Stacey comments. You'll be able to get a bit of color where you can't normally!"

"Yeah well. I guess I could." She self consciously pulls off the tee.

"Nice move, Em, " you say. "Sorry - Matt. Now I can see where you normally wear your bikini." Sure enough across her 8 year old chest is a definite pale area which would match up to where a bikini would normally sit.

"Oh bugger it!" Emma retorts.

"Ignore it." Stacey interjects. "Just lie down and get some sun. Nobody's going to be looking at an 8 year old boy's chest."

"Do you think I need sunscreen?" you ask. You realize that you're sitting on the beach totally naked, and in normal circumstances you would expect to get severely burnt if you were to stay out for long in the sun. With no trunks on could be a major complication if you were to get burnt down below.

"How the hell should I know!" Stacey replies. She picks up the tube of sunscreen and reads the label. "Don't think you'll want this one - it's colored, so that you know where you're applied it That would make you stand out like - oh, one the Blue Men we saw in Las Vegas last year. Only everyone was supposed to be looking at them."

Fair enough. You lay down alongside the others. Well, if you do catch the sun, this would be even better than wearing that special swimwear than lets the sun's UV rays through the material.

Several minutes pass, with you all enjoying the sunshine. Then...
1322112221.title: The beach

choices: some people shouting and pointing into the river
13221122211.content:
You are now getting uncomfortably warm in the sun, and to be honest a bit bored. The cool flowing river is looking quite appealing. "OK - I'm off for a swim." you announce to your two companions. You take their lack of a response as an acknowledgment, if not approval, so you get up and start the walk down to the water's edge.

This is incredibly nerve wracking. Walking to the beach earlier had been bad enough, knowing that you are totally naked in public, but al least you then had Stacey and Emma to provide some degree of assurance that you were still invisible. Now you have no such assurance, and you are edging forwarding, with the definite fear than someone may point at you and scream, or even worse laugh!

But nobody seems to have noticed you at all, and you reach the water, where you dabble your toes in. Hmm, quite warm.- guess it's quite shallow at the edge. You plow on into the water, heading towards the deeper water. Somehow the thought of being in water at least covering your waist is very appealing - the fear of suddenly becoming visible again still praying on your mind.

The further you go into the water the deeper and cooler it becomes, until it goes over your waist and you relax. Now you drop yourself down under the water, so only your head remains above, and gently splash around, cooling down nicely.

Much better.You stay here for a few minutes, and glance back towards the water's edge.... Suddenly you notice...
13221122211.title: You go for a swim

132211222111.content:
You have obviously not been paying any attention to what has been going on around you, as there seems to be a sudden commotion, with people moving about in the water, and worryingly getting closer to you. You stand up again to try to see what's going on.

"it was over there..." you can hear an excited voice say. You see a boy pointing into the water near where you are standing.

Then you notice Stacey, who is standing on the beach looking out across the water. "Danny!" she calls, and you can see her motioning with her arms. Oh blimey - what is in the water that is disturbing everyone?

Then someone standing in the water points to where you are standing. "There - I think I can see it."

You look down, and around your legs and see nothing out of the ordinary. Grief - what is it? With people now starting to move towards you, you are getting increasingly concerned. What will you do?
132211222111.title: There's something in the water...

13221122212.content:
"OK, I've had enough of this..." Emma announces.

She has always been sporty, and lying in the sun must have been agony for her, as she's normally running around, even in hot weather.

"OK, so what you you want to do?" you ask. "I don't think they'll let you join in with the beach volleyball - you're a bit short."

"Well, we can always throw around a beach ball. Not the same, but at least it's doing something."

Stacey has a dig in her bag and produces an inflatable beachball - although currently deflated - and hands it to Emma. She takes a deep breath and attempts to blow it up, with some difficulty.

"Bloody hell, this is so stupid! I could do this in a minute normally."

"Can it Em!" you whisper..."Enough of the bad language. You're only 8, remember."

"Yeah, but... OK - you blow the sodding thing up then."

She tosses the partly inflated ball over towards you.

What are you going to do?
13221122212.title: beach ball

choices: Try to think of something else to do
132211222121.content:
Well, you may be invisible, but your lungs are working fine, so this should be a doddle. You grasp the valve between your fingers, hold it to your mouth and start blowing. Easy!

“Guess your lungs match your new age Em.” You say between puffs on the valve, “Have to leave the hard work to the grown-ups!”

“Oh crap, Dan. Put the ball down!” Emma whispers forcefully between clenched teeth. “Now!”

A short distance away from you is a young child around 2 – 3 years old, stood next to her family, all sprawled on the sand. She appears to be watching you blowing up the ball.

“What’s wrong? First you want me to blow up the ball, now you don’t.”

“Yeah, but you’re not supposed to be attracting an audience. Put the bloody ball down!”

You lower the ball to the ground, still holding on to the valve, and try to work out why Emma is getting so agitated.

Emma rests her hands on Stacey’s tummy, leans her small body over Stacey towards you, and continues in a loud whisper. “Don’t be so gormless! You’re invisible. Beach balls don’t generally float in mid-air and inflate themselves! At least keep in on the ground, and keep it discreet. ”

Whoops! No wonder the child was watching you, or rather the floating ball. Just as well she’s too young to tell anyone what she saw. You look around to see if anyone else seems to have noticed anything odd. There doesn’t appear to be anyone else looking your way. Phew! You crouch down, and continue blowing into the beach ball’s value, keeping it firming on the ground, whilst watching the infant to make sure she doesn’t point out the self inflating ball to anyone! Then you attach the plug to the valve, and the ball is ready to use – although clearly you won’t be able to participate playing with it. This could prove to be boring afternoon on the beach then.

“Beach ball is inflated.” You say. “Help yourself.”

“Great… but who am I supposed to play with? Stacey – you fancy a game?”

Stacey half opens one eye, having been only vaguely aware of the preceding conversation. “Eh, what? Aren’t little boys supposed to be able to play on their own? I’m busy.” And her eye shuts again.

"Ah" Annie said, standing up and approaching Emma."This is whom I'm to thank for my current attire" She gives a quick nod "My dear Emma, you have my gratitude. Apologies if I have not been able to yet grasp your tongue." Emma stares blankly for a moment before looking Annie up and down.

14212121111.content:
"So how exactly did you get into trouble?" you ask.

"Well," Annie starts, "it was a while ago."

"Yeah, I think that's taken as read - you've been in a bottle for over 300 years, so anything you did would have been a while ago."

"I was younger. Perhaps around twenty years old, and full of energy and youthful high spirits. My apprenticeship was completed, and I was celebrating my new status as a witch."

"Oh, right. Graduation. Yeah, I can relate to that."

Annie continues to describe the family that she had lodged with during her training, and the brother and sister who shared the room next to hers (they had to share so that Annie was able to stay, as the rent was an important income for the family). After Annie's equivalent of a graduation ceremony she went to the tavern to celebrate, and needless to say the group of witches all got a little merry, and decided to have a bit of drunken fun.

Annie describes how they played a few magical tricks on some of the other clientele in the tavern before being thrown out. They had debated turning the landlord into a pig as retaliation, but in the end had merely cast an enchantment on his boars instead, so that they would all react to him as if he was a sow in season for the next day. They headed giggling into the forest where they continuing their high spirited celebrations around a fire in a moon-lit clearing, with firewater brought from the tavern. They eventually disbursed and made their way home, with Annie returning to her lodgings with her friend Amy.

“Thought everyone was tea total then?” you interject. From Annie’s expression you realize she doesn’t understand. “Um, alcohol was banned?”

“Yes and no. There were a few taverns about, although very discreet. The Massachusetts Governors considered any form of alcohol or to be abhorrent – along with any form of music, dance or celebration. However, many of the populous had other ideas.

“So, what happened next?” you ask, realizing you have stopped Annie’s story.

She had returned with Amy to her lodgings in the early hours, when they were aware of talking in the next room – occupied by the brother and sister. The boy (Benjamin) was thirteen and his sister (Eve) twelve, and (according to Annie) both were well beyond when they could have been married. However, being in a puritan community they were well aware that they had to contain any personal frustrations, and their parents would have punished them severely had they given in to temptation – or at least if they were found out.

However, in their high spirited and somewhat drunken state Annie and Amy decided to ensure that the young couple were able to fulfill their obvious desires and relieve their frustrations. So they enacted a magical enchantment, turning the brother and sister into little cottontails, and left them to let nature takes its course.

“Blimey. I can image how that got you into trouble!”

“Oh. It wasn’t that which got us into trouble – well not immediately. By daybreak they changes back again, and were none the wiser, both thinking that they’d had a particularly vivid and fanciful dream. The problem was around a month later, when they had to explain the appearance of a litter of new born kittens in their bedroom one night.

“You’re kidding!” you splutter. “You mean the girl was pregnant with bunnies? How did that happen? No - second thoughts. I can guess the answer to that question! What I mean is, well, how could she give birth to bunnies?”

“Well, quite easily, as they are very small, and slipped out without much fuss… it was my first midwifery."

“That’s not what I meant. Why bunnies – if she was pregnant, why not human babies.”

“Oh, because the enchantment extended only to them. Anything that happened whilst they were in their animal form was unaffected, so the babies stayed as rabbits. They were quite cute too.”

Somehow you aren’t entirely sure if you believe Annie’s story – although given what you have seen of her so far you are tempted to accept it as entirety truthful. “Just promise me that you won’t turn me into a cottontail.” You say.

“Only when you ask me to...” Annie responds.

You assume that she meant ‘if’ - although somehow you aren’t entirely sure. Perhaps not worth pondering about now.
So, what are you going to do now. Sit here listening to stories or see if Annie can actually do anything interesting?

You hear her words, as if they were a fading whisper of wind...as the changes begin.

You feel your hair grow out to a length...far beyond any that your mother ever would've let it grow to before insisting on cutting it herself. Shoulder-length, maybe even a bit longer.

You feel your facial hair retreat, and become much finer. Wait...this is happening all over your body. You arms, legs, chest, back...even your pubes are becoming softer...finer...

Your nose becomes smaller...thinner. Your cheekbones become higher...

Your neck narrows...if you could make a sound, you'd notice that it would be higher than you're used to.

Other things narrow as well...your shoulders...your waist...hell, your entire torso. Your hips stay about the same, oddly enough.

Your backside...feels...different than usual. Softer...squishier...

Your chest is more tender than it's ever been, even more so than that time that the doc suggested that you wear an undershirt for soccer practice...

And it grows.

You watch it, even though you can't look at it. It's magic, there's no point in explaining it.

It grows past the point where you could pass it off as "cross-country swelling". B...C...it finally stops at a full D cup. You know this, due to some...experimentation with your mom's wardrobe a couple of years ago.

You feel your organs rearrange themselves...your testicles working their way into your torso and completely changing their function...your penis reversing itself, shooting its way into yourself to form your vagina, labia, clitoris...your prostate expanding and hollowing to form your uterus...

Your thighs...they narrow, losing your hard-earned muscle definition. They look softer, but they feel firmer, as hard as that might me to conceive. That might be because your femurs are that much slimmer than they were before, setting you up for osteoporosis in your 40s (as opposed to your 60s if you had remained male).

Your calves...don't actually change. At all. Even as a guy, they were larger than most. As a girl, they're even more well-defined.

Your feet shrink down to a 9B (from a US 10 C), and your fingers narrow a bit.

1421212111111212.content:
A single sip...

And you pull back. Something is too...snake-like...about that voice.

You take that sip, and you ask her, "Have you appeared to any other people?"

"Yes," she says. "I am she who appeared to the first true mortals, Cain and Abel. I am Lilith, First of the Demons, and I am now in your power. You controlled yourself after a single sip, which is far better than the kinslayer was capable of. You are the first that I've known in these six thousand years that has been deserving of me."

"Six thousand? But I thought..."

"Relax, life was around for millions, maybe billions of years before we started to pay attention. All of your 'theories' are safe, believe me. By the way, how is it that I cannot resist you?"

"Well," you begin, "my dad died a couple of years ago..."

"STOP! That's all I need to hear. I cannot lie to any being that has had a parent receive the gift of mortality."

"'Gift???' By all the gods that I used to believe in..." Your rage rises...you haven't felt this kind of emotion...well, since your dad died, two years ago. If death is a gift...

"PEACE!", the angel...well, that's about the best way to describe her...said. "I cannot tell a lie to you, but I can prevent you from causing harm to others. Mortality...it's the closest word we, as Nesharim, have to the 'final reward'. We are barred from their land."

"I don't understand," you say. "The 'final reward' is Heaven?"

"Correct."

"And those who are worthy go there?"

"Correct. We were here before things such as 'good' or 'evil', so we," by which, she meant her kind, "are exempt and excluded from those grounds."

"What about the ones who aren't worthy?"

"All mortals will be judged. Those who are worthy will join the Creator in their Reward. Those who are not worthy will receive Oblivion."

"That's it? No Hell, no Cerberus, no chance at redemption?"

"That's all. Think about it. No matter what Mussolini did, he knew that his soul would carry on after he died, regardless of the scale of his monstrosities. Same with Hitler, same with Lenin, same with all of the worst monsters of history. Their own egos couldn't conceive of anything less, and the Church taught that they could be forgiven. The Church taught that the soul was immortal, regardless of their misdeeds...but they were wrong. The worst punishment for them is simply...nothing. Letting their spirits crumble in isolation, until there is nothing left. Not even a single ash, not even a single speck of what they once were."

"That's kind of extreme...what about the people between me and Mussolini?"

"They will be judged as they are. If they have lived a good life, causing more good than harm, then they shall receive their Reward. If not..."

"Oblivion?"

"Aye."

"And if it's perfectly balanced?"

"Well," Lilith stated, "I haven't seen that happen as long as mortals have lived on this planet. There are too many variables, it's essentially impossible for that to happen."

"But what if it did?," you pressed.

"Well, then that being would be the Àretósmè, the Uniter, the One Who Was Foretold. He is the Harbinger of the end of the Universe as we know it. He would be the son of an Immortal and a Mortal, which hasn't happened for 1000 years."

"Wait, you mean..."

"...no. The one you know as 'Jesus' was a full child of Sol and Luna, an incarnation of Oshrenikof the Healer. Arthur of Britannia, however...he was only a son of Sol. The God took possession of the wizard, however briefly as he needed to, and gave his seed to Ygraine. That one died before he was ready, and the next one..."

"Is it me?"

"No. He has not been born yet. When he is...all of the glory and honor shall be his. The lesser 'Gods' may be proud, and might even stand for a while, but they will all crumble before his Shining Light. Even Sol and Luna...well, that is a story for another time.

"I have told you much, far more than I meant to. You have earned much power...what do you desire?"

144.content:
The clouds of haze become more solid, almost like thick smoke now. You continued to stare in disbelief, they seemed to be forming into a very feminine shape. An almost human feminine shape...

The blue fog had two very distinct bulbs sitting on top of what appeared to be an hourglass figure. Above that was a smaller shape suggesting a head, the "hair" was instead one big mass of smoke going past the cloud's shoulders. A small pointed tip, representing a nose, was all that could be seen of a face. There were no feet, only a spiral wisp that connected to the torso. It looked sort of like the top of a soft ice cream cone. Two arms crisscrossed underneath the shape's chest.

Finally, the smoke stopped billowing out of the bottle. The figure made of haze hovered in place directly above the side turned bottle. It didn't even seem alive, it was behaving just like a cloud floating aimlessly in the sky.

You were more curious then terrified at this point. This thing didn't seem sentient but you attempted to greet it.

"U-uh, hello?"

No response. You edged closer to it.

"C-can you hear me? What are you exactly?"

Still nothing, it continued to drift slowly in place above the bottle. Against any better judgment, you outstretched your hand in an attempt to touch. You always had a knack for doing incredibly stupid things without thinking.

When you made contact with the wisp, your hand phased through its face. It was as if nothing were there at all. It was like something had activated the wisp, two yellow eyes above its nose instantly shot open. You yelled slightly and pulled your hand back.

The shape sprung to life now, as you grasped your hand fearful that it had somehow been contaminated by whatever this thing was. The thing was bouncing all around the room now, as if eager to escape. It took the form of a giant cloud of blue fog as it repeatably tapped at everything. It seemed as if it was looking for something. Suddenly, it turned its attention towards...

info.brief_description: You come across some old witches potions, and have a bit of fun with them.   PLEASE ADD!
info.description:
Your name is Daniel. You are 20 years old and single.

Whilst on vacation you come across a old box containing some bottles that belonged to a witch. The contents have magical powers - if you can work out how to use them.

Please add to the story!!!

I reserve the right to edit any additions for spelling and context / continuity, but will try to keep it to a minimum. However, any one-liner additions that contribute nothing to the storyline will be removed. And please keep it as fun and positive as possible!

Reviews, feedback or comments also welcome.
